desc: Sweetums intimate wipes smell amazing and are made with a hint of flavor. Wipes are individually packed and perfect for on-the-go. Use for when you want to be spontaneous with your partner, or for a quick refresh. Use after they gym, after a night of dancing or take with you on vacation.

layout.text: Buy 6 or more boxes of wipes and save 25% plus free shipping! Use code BUY6 at checkout
